mapper.select: SELECT r_tmp.r_id, r_tmp.rolename, a_tmp.a_id, a_tmp.`name`, a_tmp.url FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT role.id AS r_id, role.rolename AS rolename FROM role LEFT JOIN role_authority ON role.id = role_authority.ROLE_ID ) AS r_tmp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT authority.id AS a_id, authority.`name` AS `name`, authority.url AS url, role_authority.AUTHORITY_ID, role_authority.ROLE_ID FROM authority, role_authority WHERE authority.id = role_authority.AUTHORITY_ID ) AS a_tmp ON r_tmp.r_id = a_tmp.ROLE_ID

SELECT r_tmp.r_id, r_tmp.rolename, a_tmp.a_id, a_tmp.`name`, a_tmp.url FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT role.id AS r_id, role.rolename AS rolename FROM role LEFT JOIN role_authority ON role.id = role_authority.ROLE_ID ) AS r_tmp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT authority.id AS a_id, authority.`name` AS `name`, authority.url AS url, role_authority.AUTHORITY_ID, role_authority.ROLE_ID FROM authority, role_authority WHERE authority.id = role_authority.AUTHORITY_ID ) AS a_tmp ON r_tmp.r_id = a_tmp.ROLE_ID WHERE r_id = #{id}
